Case Studies

Pool Solar System Revival

Complete restoration of an aging pool solar heating system

Challenge

A 10-year-old solar pool heating system with significant performance degradation and multiple leaks.

Solution

Comprehensive system inspection, leak repair, panel restoration, and system optimization.

Results

Restored system efficiency to 95%, extending system life by 5+ years.

Saved client $3,500 compared to system replacement

Merritt Island, FLOctober 2023

DHW System Optimization

Performance enhancement for domestic hot water system

Challenge

Solution

System rebalancing, sensor calibration, and tank maintenance.

Results

40% improvement in hot water production efficiency.

Reduced energy costs by $45/month
